General.Name: Pelat Timah Nusantara Tbk
General.Description: PT Pelat Timah Nusantara Tbk operates as a tinplate manufacturer in Indonesia. It offers tinplate products in the form of coils and sheets. It also exports its products internationally. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

8.Name: Olan  Kurniawan
8.Title: Head of Operation - Commercial Audit Division
